DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare naproxen plasma levels and gastroduodenal mucosal injury after administration of LT-NS001 as compared to Naprosyn in subjects age 45-70.
DOC.brief_title: Comparator Study of LT-NS001 in Healthy Subjects With Endoscopic Evaluation
DOC.criteria: BMI 1830 kg/m2 No NSAID's for 14 days prior to baseline endoscopy Pregnant/Nursing women History of documented gastroduodenal ulcer
